welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leiden, a charming city known for its picturesque canals, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

restaurants.name: Eterij & Proeflokaal Het Stadsbrouwhuis
restaurants.description: Eterij & Proeflokaal Het Stadsbrouwhuis is a gastropub located in Leiden.

restaurants.name: Bocconi
restaurants.description: Bocconi is a italian restaurant located in Leiden.

restaurants.description: Better Bagels is a bagel shop located in Leiden.

restaurants.description: Waag is a café located in Leiden.

restaurants.description: Eetwinkel Noroc is a sandwich spot located in Leiden.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
